Who? · Books · Blog · Setup · Work · Now · Mentoring

Hi! I'm Ryan!

I wrote the books and guides that your developers read.

There's a high chance I've answered their questions on Stack Overflow too.

I pay the bills through consultancy work, developing people (and apps!) in exchange for money.

If you want to contact me about working together, go here first.

If you're interested, you can see what I'm doing now.
